definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Mr Wei rushed to Taipei during his rest day on a Sunday to see Mr Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 魏姓同学便利用星期日赶到台北和张先生见面。

sentences.english: This coupon isn't good for Saturdays and Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 这张联票不能用于星期六和星期日。

sentences.english: It was a beautiful, cloudless sunny day at the end of summer.
sentences.chinese: 这是夏末一个万里无云的晴朗的星期日。

sentences.english: Last Saturday, Kevin put things in boxes all day. He went to bed very late that night.
sentences.chinese: 上星期日，克文整天放东西到箱子里，他那晚很晚睡。

sentences.english: It was Ishtar´s Sunday and was celebrated with rabbits and eggs.
sentences.chinese: 它是伊师塔的星期日，和以兔子及蛋庆祝。

sentences.english: Being a professional actor of necessity means working nights and Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 作为职业演员必然意味着晚上和星期日要工作。

sentences.english: Did you take partin the planting trees last Sunday?
sentences.chinese: 上星期日你参加栽树了吗？

sentences.english: Saturday and Sunday would not be included in those interval calculations.
sentences.chinese: 星期六和星期日不包括在这个时间间隔计算中。

sentences.english: The help-wanted ads are the first things I look at in Sunday's paper.
sentences.chinese: 在星期日的报纸上，我首先看的是招聘广告。

sentences.english: Semi-finals of the "Mr. American" Contest were held last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上星期日举行了“美国先生”半决赛。

sentences.english: First is the uneven heating of the earth's surface by the sun.
sentences.chinese: 首先是地球的表面的参差不齐的热化在星期日以前。

sentences.english: We may often utilize Sundays to read reference books.
sentences.chinese: 我们也可以利用星期日来看看课外书。

sentences.english: The London Symphony Orchestra  broadcasts every Sunday on London Station.
sentences.chinese: 伦敦交响乐团每星期日都在伦敦电台演出节目。

sentences.english: Setting a new record for brewed extravagance, Vintage Nr.
sentences.chinese: 设置一个奢侈的酿造，葡萄酒星期日新纪录。

sentences.english: The visitors will come back next Sunday to play off the game stopped by rain.
sentences.chinese: 客队将于下星期日回来赛完因雨而中断的比赛。

definition: to compensate for working on a holiday by resting on a workday/to compensate for resting on a workday by working on a holiday
